issue.title: [C#] Fix TableFromRecordBatches
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13129](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13129). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ChunkedArray constructor should make its own copy of the IList<Array>

Otherwise, when using TableFromRecordBatches, the resulting table columns have no data array.

Similar case for the constructor of Table
